alert.note: Alert for De Witt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 03 at 4:40PM CST until January 03 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central De Witt County in central Illinois... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 439 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Maroa, or near Clinton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Weldon and Farmer City. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
